<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

	<e:Image source="Help_Shade_png" y="94.34" x="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	<e:Image source="Help_Shade_png" y="582.34" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	<e:Image source="Txt_Title_Help_png" y="95" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Button id="backBtn" label="" x="16" y="18.33">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="Btn_Back_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LevelInfoPanelSkin" width="418" height="458" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="Common_Info_BG_png"/>
	<e:Image source="Common_Info_BG_png" x="417" scaleX="-1"/>
	<e:Image source="LevelInfo_Light_png" x="93" y="87"/>
	<e:Label id="levelLab" text="关卡 1" x="90" y="20" anchorOffsetX="0" width="241" textAlign="center" fontFamily="黑体" textColor="0xf9ff00" stroke="2"/>
	<e:Image source="LevelInfo_Star_Dim_png" x="66" y="110"/>
	<e:Image source="LevelInfo_Star_Dim_png" y="70" x="167"/>
	<e:Image source="LevelInfo_Star_Dim_png" x="266" y="109"/>
	<e:Button id="playBtn" label="" y="309" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="LevelInfo_Btn_Play_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image id="starImg1" source="LevelInfo_Star_Light_png" x="65" y="111"/>
	<e:Image id="starImg2" source="LevelInfo_Star_Light_png" x="167" y="70"/>
	<e:Image id="starImg3" source="LevelInfo_Star_Light_png" x="265" y="108"/>
	<e:Button id="closeBtn" label="" right="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="Btn_Close_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image source="LevelInfo_Banner_png" y="211" x="72"/>
	<e:Image source="LevelInfo_Banner_png" y="257" x="72"/>
	<e:Image source="Common_Star_Light_png" x="76" y="213"/>
	<e:Image source="Txt_BestScore_png" x="82" y="261"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="maxLab" x="210" y="261" font="number3_fnt" text="0" anchorOffsetX="0" width="185"/>
	<e:Image source="GameMain_Txt_Target_png" x="110" y="219"/>
	<e:Label id="targetLab" text="得分10000" x="153" y="219" anchorOffsetX="0" width="187" size="20"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LevelPanelSkin" width="568" height="852" currentState="level1" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"

             anchorOffsetY="17" />

              anchorOffsetY="18" x.level2="286" y.level2="818.69" x.level3="332.67" y.level3="828.03" x.level4="188.67"

              y.level4="155.02" x.level5="243.34" y.level5="81.69" x.level6="220.67" y.level6="121.69" x.level7="378"

	<e:Image id="arrowImg" source="Common_Arrow_png" x="489" y="756"/>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MainPanelSkin" width="568" height="852" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="sceneGroup" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
		<e:Image id="bgImg" source="GameMain_BG_1_jpg" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="GameMain_FG_png" y="69" x="488" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="GameMain_FG_png" y="69" x="15" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="topImg" source="GameMain_Top_png" x="50" y="54" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Group id="scene" width="400" height="851" x="85" y="83" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Group id="paotongGroup" width="80" height="89" x="284" y="749" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="40" anchorOffsetY="70">
			<e:Image source="GameMain_Launcher_png" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="0"/>
			<e:Image id="curBubbleImg" source="bubble-1_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="7"/>
			<e:Image id="aimImg" source="GameMain_Aim_png" x="15" y="-114" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Rect id="bottomMask" height="200" y="653" left="0" right="0" x="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" fillAlpha="0" strokeAlpha="0" touchEnabled="true"/>
	<e:Image id="nextBubbleImg" source="bubble-1_png" x="182" y="721" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" touchEnabled="true"/>
	<e:Image id="fireImg" x="334" y="712" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="bubble-21_png"/>
	<e:Group width="26" height="28" x="354" y="746" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false" touchThrough="true">
		<e:Image source="GameMain_Count_png" x="2" y="5" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="fireLab" x="-8" y="10" font="number1_fnt" text="0" textAlign="center" width="40"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="waveImg" source="GameMain_Wave_png" x="90" y="724" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	<e:Group width="26" height="28" x="100" y="740" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false" touchThrough="true">
		<e:Image source="GameMain_Count_png" x="2" y="5" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="waveLab" x="-8" y="10" font="number1_fnt" text="0" textAlign="center" width="40"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="GameMain_Banner_png" x="0" y="-2"/>
	<e:Label id="levelLab" text="1" x="51" y="35" textColor="0xed96f7" size="20" width="63" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label id="targetLab" text="" x="195" y="35" size="20" width="175" textAlign="center" height="20" textColor="0xffffff"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLab" text="0" x="334" y="35" textColor="0xED96F7" size="20" width="155" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label id="coinLab" text="0" x="82" y="35" textColor="0xED96F7" size="20" width="155" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Group id="fireLine" width="460" height="30" x="62" y="623" touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false">
		<e:Image width="20" height="20" x="429" y="-9" source="GameMain_Line_Base_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image width="20" height="20" x="20" y="-9" source="GameMain_Line_Base_png" scaleX="-1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="GameMain_Line_png" x="18" y="-13" scale9Grid="48,3,290,23" width="413"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="pauseBtn" label="" x="515" y="9">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="Btn_Pause_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image source="GameMain_Txt_Target_png" x="266" y="7" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="PausePanelSkin" width="568" height="852" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.55"/>

	<e:Image id="logoImg" source="Txt_Title_Pause_png" y="65.3" x="182"/>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ShopPanelSkin" width="568" height="852" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="15834e10d1b"/>
	<e:Image source="Main_BG_jpg" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	<e:Button id="backBtn" label="" x="16" y="18.33">
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
		<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="Btn_Back_png"/>
		<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Skin>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image source="Txt_Title_Shop_png" y="95" x="189"/>
	<e:Image source="Shop_Coin_png" x="92.26" y="201"/>
	<e:Image source="bubble-21_png" x="251.85" y="187.7"/>
	<e:Image source="GameMain_Wave_png" x="417" y="201"/>
	<e:Group id="oneGroup" height="68.33" y="284" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" width="568" x="0">
		<e:Image source="Shop_Banner_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Button id="oneBtn" label="" x="306.41" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="Shop_Btn_Buy_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image source="Shop_Coin_png" x="321.37" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel x="364.33" font="hallBet_fnt" text="50" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Image source="bubble-21_png" x="127" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel x="207" text="+ 3" font="number2_fnt" scaleX="0.3" scaleY="0.3" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="twoGroup" height="68.33" y="353" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" width="568" x="0">
		<e:Image source="Shop_Banner_png" x="108" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Button id="twoBtn" label="" x="306.41" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="Shop_Btn_Buy_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:Button>
